## dragging.Dragger.onDrag() method

Handles calculating where the element should actually be moved to.

**Signature:**

```typescript
onDrag(e: PointerEvent, totalDelta: Coordinate): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  e | PointerEvent |  |
|  totalDelta | [Coordinate](./blockly.utils_namespace.coordinate_class.md) | The total amount in pixel coordinates the mouse has moved since the start of the drag. |

**Returns:**

void
